trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were 5 other sightings in Stephenville on or around October 29th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi was at my brother's house in stephenville tx, and was about to leave to make my way back to my home in the dfw area. when we were walking outside to say our goodbyes we could hear sirens within the city, and then we heard several dogs starting to bark at the same time. i made the comment about how people should listen to their dogs, because pets have a sick sense of knowing something is wrong before humans do. my sister in law made comments about the night before when some of her friends saw ufos in the sky just the day before. then at 19:20 we saw what i would call ufo the first sighting was two oval\circular looking objects less than two miles to the south by south west of where my brother lives. they appeared for about a second then reappeared to the south about quarter of a mile again within two seconds or so. the sky wasn't dark yet so if something turned off its lights we would have seen a solid form of sort, but we never did. after talking for a few minutes about what we just saw, we decided to head to the southwest. when we were about to turn onto the highway heading towards dublin, tx, we saw four lights (lined up in a row) they were lower to the ground (in my opinion) than the other ufos we saw. the four lights appeared for maybe two seconds then disappeared and we never saw anything again for the rest of the night. shortly after we heard and saw two military jets coming from the north east heading in a southwest direction. i am prior military for almost 10 years so i am familiar with the sound of our military jets, especially when they travel at a high rate of speed. please feel free to contact about these events. i am not saying i believe in ufos from outer space, but i do know what i saw last night.
Summary: UFO Sighting in Stephenville TX, 29 Oct 2008
